column5: News from Browns' Clearwater West Lodge regarding Winter Lake Trout Fishing. Big fish caught so far 17, 22, 28 and today a 24 that was release. Ice conditions are great 8 to 12 inches and about 4 inches of snow on the ice. Deluxe Accommodations available. If you are looking for a place to go Ice Fishing, give us a call at 1-807-597-2884. Walleyes are also available.
